perc_total_25_3_using_devices.long_name: Percent of the Total Population with Good Internet Speed
perc_total_25_3_using_devices.short_description: Percent of the total population with a good internet speed (above 25/3 MB/s, able to stream video or online game for one device).
perc_total_25_3_using_devices.statement: {value} of the total population in {features.name} has a good internet speed.
